alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:01PM CDT until June 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR IRON AND SOUTHEASTERN ASHLAND COUNTIES... At 201 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Upson, or 14 miles northwest of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Turtle Flambeau Flowage around 225 PM CDT. Mercer around 230 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Long Lake, Manitowish, Island Lake Iron County, Fisher Lake, Iron Belt and Gile Flowage. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
